nodes.id: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在新疆生产建设兵团的副省级领导机关，受中共中央和新疆党委的双重领导。
description.en: The sub-provincial leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, under the dual leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the Xinjiang Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区的一个兼具党、政、军、企特性的组织。
description.en: An organization in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China with characteristics of a party, government, military, and enterprise.

nodes.id: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会的上级机构，选举产生兵团党委。
description.en: The superior body of the CPC Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps Committee, which elects the Corps Party Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会
中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委
en: Communist Party Committee of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在新疆维吾尔自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任新疆生产建设兵团党委书记、政委。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Party Secretary and Political Commissar of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。
description.en: Chinese politician.

description.zh-cn: 与新疆生产建设兵团为同一机构，在经济建设领域使用此名称。
description.en: The same entity as the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, using this name in the field of economic construction.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任新疆生产建设兵团党委副书记、司令员。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Party Secretary and Commander of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任新疆生产建设兵团党委副书记、副政委。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Party Secretary and Deputy Political Commissar of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任新疆生产建设兵团党委副书记、副政委。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Party Secretary and Deputy Political Commissar of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Party Secretary of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing body of the Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

nodes.id: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会的宣传部门。
description.en: The propaganda department of the Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

relationships.source: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会由中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团代表大会选举产生，并在代表大会闭会期间执行其决议。
description.en: The Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps is elected by the Congress of the Communist Party of China Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps and executes its resolutions when the Congress is not in session.

relationships.source: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会受中国共产党中央委员会领导，并定期向其报告工作。
description.en: The Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps is under the leadership of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and reports its work to it regularly.

relationships.source: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会受中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会领导，形成双重领导关系。
description.en: The Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps is under the leadership of the Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, forming a dual leadership relationship.

relationships.target: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会

description.zh-cn: 《中国共产党章程》是中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the Communist Party of China is the legal source of authority for the Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

relationships.source: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会常务委员会是兵团党委的常设机构。
description.en: The Standing Committee is the standing body of the Corps Party Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会
relationships.target: 新疆生产建设兵团

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆生产建设兵团委员会是新疆生产建设兵团的领导机关。
description.en: The Communist Party Committee of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps is the leading body of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.
